h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand
content: Unfortunately, you won't be able to hide up here forever, as the boss will often start to turn its body, and then slam down its hand onto the poison river, but you can slam down first and run for safety.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand'.
The content is as follows:
Unfortunately, you won't be able to hide up here forever, as the boss will often start to turn its body, and then slam down its hand onto the poison river, but you can slam down first and run for safety.
